pr_title: feat: new sample - Tables: Relax column

timeline.message: feat: new sample - Tables: Relax column

timeline.bodyText: nit: Probably don't need this comment in the test?
timeline.author: kurtisvg

timeline.bodyText: nit: This seems to imply that you are modifying an existing Schema, but really you are rebuilding a new schema from scratch here. Would it be better to show the users how to retrieve the current Schema, and then modify the necessary fields instead of rebuilding from scratch?
timeline.author: kurtisvg
